meanings.definition: To emit a strong, offensive odor.
meanings.sent1: After playing outside all day, the dog came in funk-ing up the whole room.
meanings.sent2: The garbage left in the sun was funk-ing terribly by the time it was collected.
meanings.sent3: The smelly cheese was funk-ing up the fridge, making everyone hold their noses.
meanings.sent4: The old shoes funk-ing in the closet reminded her of the long hike they took.
meanings.sent5: The dirty socks funk-ing in the laundry basket were unbearable to be near.

meanings.definition: A state of fear or panic.
meanings.sent1: She felt a sense of funk-ing when she heard a strange noise in the dark.
meanings.sent2: The loud thunderstorm outside put the whole town in a state of funk-ing.
meanings.sent3: His fear of spiders put him in a funk-ing whenever he saw one.
meanings.sent4: The horror movie left her in a state of funk-ing for the rest of the night.
meanings.sent5: The haunted house tour put everyone in a state of funk-ing as they walked through.

meanings.definition: A style of music characterized by a strong rhythm and improvisation.
meanings.sent1: The band played funky music that had everyone funk-ing on the dance floor.
meanings.sent2: The nightclub was filled with people enjoying the funky beats and funk-ing along.
meanings.sent3: The jazz club always had a great funk-ing vibe that drew in a diverse crowd.
meanings.sent4: The music festival featured various genres, but the funk-ing bands stole the show.
meanings.sent5: The radio station played non-stop funk-ing tunes that kept listeners grooving all day.

meanings.definition: To avoid doing something out of fear or laziness.
meanings.sent1: He kept funk-ing his homework, hoping the teacher wouldn't notice.
meanings.sent2: She was funk-ing the difficult conversation with her friend because she was nervous.
meanings.sent3: The cat was funk-ing going outside in the rain, preferring to stay dry indoors.
meanings.sent4: They were funk-ing the challenging hike, choosing to relax at home instead.
meanings.sent5: The student was funk-ing studying for the test, procrastinating until the last minute.
